name: CAVEMAN HARRY
description:
My compo entry for Ludum Dare 36. The theme was Ancient Technology so I did a game about cavemen in the style of old ZX spectrum games, 1 Colour per tile, etc. I think it came out really well and Its the largest game I've ever made, With a world consisting of 35 separate chunks!

Get food for your starving tribe in this challenging adventure!

  • Find the three keys!
  • Overcome tough obstacles!
  • Talk to people!

Link to page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=27519
